title: The Henderson House: A Short Halloween Tale
description: Finding out if ghosts are real is how Candace wants to spend her Halloween night.Although she knows that anything remotely scary drives her fear, it is time for her to face it.Getting her friends on board with her plan will only be the first challenge she faces for the night.If you enjoy supernatural tales that make you want to hide under the covers, this short story will not disappoint.
author: Arthur Ni
